languages.text: {n}Дама в золотом делает изящный реверанс.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, мы отыскали одного из лицемеров. Вот он, в камзоле: все еще пытается притворяться. Отметьте его скорее".

{n}The lady in the golden mask curtsies gracefully.{/n} "Your Celestial Highness, we have exposed one of the impostors. There he is — the one in the jacket — still clinging to his facade. You ought to brand him, quickly!"
languages.original_text: {n}Дама в золотом делает изящный реверанс.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, мы отыскали одного из лицемеров. Вот он, в камзоле: все еще пытается притворяться. Отметьте его скорее".

traits.locale_text: {n}The woman in the golden mask curtsies gracefully.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we have exposed one of the impostors. There he is, the one in the jacket, still clinging to his facade. You ought to brand him, quickly!"

{n}The woman in the golden mask curtsies gracefully.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we have exposed one of the impostors. There he is, the one in the jacket, still clinging to his facade. You ought to brand him, quickly!"

{n}The lady in the golden mask curtsies gracefully.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we have exposed one of the impostors. There he is — the one in the jacket — still clinging to his facade. You ought to brand him, quickly!"

{n}The lady in the golden mask curtsies gracefully.{/n} "Your Celestial Highness, we have exposed one of the impostors. There he is — the one in the jacket — still clinging to his facade. You ought to brand him, quickly!"

{n}The lady in the golden mask curtsies gracefully.{/n} "Your Celestial Highness, we have exposed one of the impostors. There he is — the one in the jacket — still clinging to his facade. You ought to brand him, quickly!"

languages.text: {n}戴着金色面具的女士优雅地行了个屈膝礼。{/n}“来自上界的大人，我们发现了一个冒牌货。他就在那里，就是那个穿着夹克的人，可他依然在负隅顽抗。您应该立刻给他打上烙印！”
languages.original_text: {n}The lady in the golden mask curtsies gracefully.{/n} "Your Celestial Highness, we have exposed one of the impostors. There he is — the one in the jacket — still clinging to his facade. You ought to brand him, quickly!"

traits.locale_text: {n}戴着金色面具的女士优雅地行了个屈膝礼。{/n}“来自上界的大人，我们发现了一个冒牌货。他就在那里，就是那个穿着夹克的人，可他依然在负隅顽抗。您应该立刻给他打上烙印！”

languages.text: {n}黄金の仮面をつけた女性は優雅にお辞儀をした。{/n}「天の閣下、私たちは偽者のひとりを暴きました。あそこにいる彼です。あの上着を着た男、いまだに自分の偽りの仮面にすがりついております。速やかに刻印をお与えください！」
languages.original_text: {n}The lady in the golden mask curtsies gracefully.{/n} "Your Celestial Highness, we have exposed one of the impostors. There he is — the one in the jacket — still clinging to his facade. You ought to brand him, quickly!"

traits.locale_text: {n}黄金の仮面をつけた女性は優雅にお辞儀をした。{/n}「天の閣下、私たちは偽者のひとりを暴きました。あそこにいる彼です。あの上着を着た男、いまだに自分の偽りの仮面にすがりついております。速やかに刻印をお与えください！」

languages.text: {n}La mujer de la máscara dorada se inclina cortésmente ante ti.{/n} «Excelencia Celestial, hemos desenmascarado a uno de los impostores. Ahí mismo lo tiene, el hombre de la chaqueta, aún empeñado en mantener su falsa apariencia. ¡Rápido, márquelo antes de que sea tarde!».
languages.original_text: {n}The lady in the golden mask curtsies gracefully.{/n} "Your Celestial Highness, we have exposed one of the impostors. There he is — the one in the jacket — still clinging to his facade. You ought to brand him, quickly!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La mujer de la máscara dorada se inclina cortésmente ante ti.{/n} «Excelencia Celestial, hemos desenmascarado a uno de los impostores. Ahí mismo lo tiene, el hombre de la chaqueta, aún empeñado en mantener su falsa apariencia. ¡Rápido, márquelo antes de que sea tarde!».

languages.text: {n}Altın maskeli kadın, zarifçe reveransta bulunuyor.{/n} "Semavi Efendimiz, taklitçilerden birini ortaya çıkardık. İşte şuradaki, ceketli olan. Hâlâ sahtekârlığına tutunuyor. Onu hemen damgalamalısınız!"
languages.original_text: {n}The lady in the golden mask curtsies gracefully.{/n} "Your Celestial Highness, we have exposed one of the impostors. There he is — the one in the jacket — still clinging to his facade. You ought to brand him, quickly!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Altın maskeli kadın, zarifçe reveransta bulunuyor.{/n} "Semavi Efendimiz, sahtekârlardan birini ortaya çıkardık. İşte şuradaki, ceketli olan. Hâlâ sahtekârlığına tutunuyor. Onu hemen damgalamalısınız!"

languages.text: {n}La dame au masque d'or vous adresse une révérence gracieuse.{/n} « Votre Altesse Célestissime, nous avons démasqué l'un des imposteurs. C'est lui, l'homme au pourpoint. Voyez comme il tente encore de sauver les apparences. Vous devriez lui apposer la marque au plus vite ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The lady in the golden mask curtsies gracefully.{/n} "Your Celestial Highness, we have exposed one of the impostors. There he is — the one in the jacket — still clinging to his facade. You ought to brand him, quickly!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La dame au masque d'or vous adresse une révérence gracieuse.{/n} « Votre Altesse Célestissime, nous avons démasqué l'un des imposteurs. C'est lui, l'homme au pourpoint. Voyez comme il tente encore de sauver les apparences. Vous devriez lui apposer la marque au plus vite ! »

languages.text: {n}Die Dame mit der Goldmaske macht einen eleganten Knicks.{/n} "Eure himmlische Hoheit, wir haben einen der Hochstapler enttarnt. Da steht er – der mit der Jacke – und klammert sich immer noch an seine Fassade. Ihr solltet ihn umgehend brandmarken!"
languages.original_text: {n}The lady in the golden mask curtsies gracefully.{/n} "Your Celestial Highness, we have exposed one of the impostors. There he is — the one in the jacket — still clinging to his facade. You ought to brand him, quickly!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Dame mit der Goldmaske macht einen eleganten Knicks.{/n} "Eure himmlische Hoheit, wir haben einen der Hochstapler enttarnt. Da steht er – der mit der Jacke – und klammert sich immer noch an seine Fassade. Ihr solltet ihn umgehend brandmarken!"
